TopicTitle: Shuttle, Spaceplanes, Plane/Shuttle Parts, Now Launch Vehicles , Engine Packs & Rovers Mods (Updated 2023/01/30)

Articles.Content:
I've been getting together a spreadsheet keeping track of all the different mods which provide shuttles, spaceplanes, as well as plane/shuttle parts.  Now that KSP 2 is almost here, I figured I'd share this.  I'm sure that I've missed mods, please let me know and I'll update it.

The spreadsheet is now also covering launch vehicles

This does not cover mods which only have a few parts, these mods are comprehensive collections of parts.

This is not intended to be a totally comprehensive set of mods.  There are a lot of mods which don't fit into these categories.  My goal here is to categorize those mods which have multiple large parts packs in the same category

Definitions

  • Shuttle has a mostly flat bottom lifting body
  • Spaceplanes are more symmetrical, and are designed to fly themselves without boosters (mostly)
  • Plane/Shuttle parts are various parts, not a complete part set to build a vehicle
  • Engine Packs need to have a variety of engines
  • Rover mods contain parts to build complete rovers

Some of the mods listed can fit into both categories, I've put them into the one that I feel best matches the mod

The spreadsheet has links to both the forum page and (usually) a Spacedock page (or github) where the mods can be downloaded from

It's a Google Sheets file, you can access it here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UFd84PutnToQhvZ5cdX9Lo6v9WqX60tXiDBzCReZFTI/edit?usp=sharing

Future Plans

  • I may also be adding a section for engine parts pack

 

Shuttle Mods

Spoiler

Name CKAN Max KSP Comments
       
APUS (beta) Y 1.7 Mk1.5 Flat bottom shuttle parts
Cormorant Aeronology - Mk3 Space Shuttle (Shuttle Lifting Body) Y 1.7 Fully featured Space Shuttle including boosters, external tank, MMU, and assorted payload mounting options as well as new texture options for the stock Mk3 cockpit, payload bays, and landing gears
Flat Bottom Shuttle Systems Y 1.7 A parts pack of 2.5m flat-bottom space plane parts, plus a few extras.
Kerbal Mini Shuttle Y 1.12 This add-on adds parts of a small shuttle to the game, which is capable of sending up in orbit Kerbin to 3 tons
KNES   1.12 This is a stockalike parts mod that allows you to create French rockets and european Ariane family & Some Conceptual spacecraft never buildt
Mk 2.5 Spaceplane Parts Y 1.12 2.5m flat-bottom spaceplane parts that generate a bit of lift
Mk-33 Y 1.12 Mk-33: X-33-inspired parts for KSP!
Mk-X Spaceplane Parts Y 1.12 Parts to make an X-37
Pteron Y 1.12 Three kerbal Micro Shuttle and Rescue Venicle (MSRV)
Recycled Parts Farscape Y 1.12 a sci-fi hot rod for jetting all around the Kerbal system. It's the Farscape module.
Shuttle Orbiter Construction Kit | Stockalike Space Shuttle Orbiter! | (Tubes!) | v1.1.8 Y 1.12 Stockalike parts for NASA's Space Shuttle Orbiter.
Space Shuttle (beta)   1.4 Space shuttle derived from the Space Shuttle System
Space Shuttle Pack   1 Space Shuttle Pack,orginally by Mike-NZ.
Space Shuttle System   1.2 Space Shuttle System is a high quality, high fidelity Space Shuttle mod for Kerbal Space Program
SPOCK-Shuttle Pathfinder Orbiter Construction Kit | Stockalike Nuclear Shuttle Pathfinder
  1.12 A mod recreating the Pathfinder, a second generation nuclear shuttle series came from the TV show For All Mankind Season 2
Ж-20 "Moroz" Spaceplane   1.12 A small Dynasoar type shuttle

MarkIVSpaceplaneSystem Y 1.1 Wide-body, massive spaceplane fuselage including advanced engines
OPT Spaceplane (Legacy) Y 1.11 OPT Legacy: Retired parts and expansion pack
OPT Spaceplane Continued Y 1.11 The "Main" pack from OPT. No more old plugin bundles. *Requires* Reconfig
Retrofuture Space Plane Parts Modernized Y 1.12 A collection of aircraft and spacecraft parts with a retro style
Thunderbirds InterKerbin Rescue Y 1.12 Craft from the classic Thunderbirds series

 

Plane & Shuttle Parts

Spoiler

Name CKAN Max KSP Comments
       
Airplane Plus Y 1.8 Adds plane parts. Images are on the album
Aviation Cockpits   1.2 Cockpits for your IVA missions
C.E.D.A Aeronautics Division Stockalike Airplane Parts Pack Y 1.7 Wings! Elevons! Turboprops! Aerospikes!
Cold War Aerospace Y 1.12 Cold War era parts- cockpits, engines, vehicles and more! Just put "ColdWarAerospace" folder inside Kerbal Space Program/"Gamedata" folder. Read INFO.pdf file for requirements
Harrier Jump Jet Parts Pack     A Harrier parts pack that provides everything but the landing gear and the hinges for under the wings, to build a Harrier Jump Jet
Hind MI-24 and MI-17 parts pack Y 1.12 A MK3 size 1.5 parts pack to build the MI-24 and MI-17 style helicopters.
Huey and Chinook Helicopter parts pack Y 1.12  
Kerbonov Kn-2 Cockpit Module Continued Y 1.12 The Kerbonov Kn-2 module is a compact 3 Kerbal cockpit for use with intermediate sized aircraft. It includes an IVA view.
Mk2 Stockalike Expansion Y 1.12 Adds a wide variety of parts for the Mk2 formfactor
Mk3 Stockalike Expansion Y 1.12 Adds a variety of new Mk3 parts to KSP
Mk3HypersonicSystems Y 1.12 A parts pack geared toward making heavy spaceplanes using the Mk3 fuselage systems
Moderately Plane Related Y 1.12 Moderately Plane Related contains high quality parts consistent with the AirplanePlus art style, and incorporates BDA+ integration for use in BDArmory dogfighter competitions such as Runway Project and Fighter Jet Round Table
Near Future Aeronautics Y 1.12 Advanced aerospace parts including intakes, propellers, jet/multimode/nuclear engines for gigantic spaceplanes
NeistAir Reupdated Y 1.12 The NeistAir Plane Part Pack
Nice MKseries Body Y 1.12 Cold War era fighter parts
PrakasaAeroworks Y 1.12 Prakasa is a pod and engine focused pack aimed at aircraft and spaceplanes, namely with the objective of filling the 2.5 meter void between the diminutive Mk2 and massive Mk3. 13 cockpits total as of 0.7, all featuring RPM IVAs. The parts are themed towards a somewhat more distant future than stock, offering greater interior space and a cleaner, spaceship-er aesthetic.
QuizTechAeroPackContinued Y 1.12 An expansion for stock and modded spaceplane parts!
Recycled Parts Y 1.12 A number of old mods, several are Mk2 parts
SpikeX supersonic project Y 1.12 NESD's warehouse
SXT Continued Y 1.12 Parts for all areas of KSP

This vapour may also be present on other planets in popular planet packs.
Forgotten Real Engines Y 1.3 FRE is a set of realistics engines intended for use with Realism Overhaul. Includes Viking engines (Ariane I to IV), Vega engines, LE-7 and LE-5 Japan engines, and more!

retracting/Vectoring Engines, Critter Crawler Y 1.12 A number of nice retractable engines along with some misc parts
RO Engines Y 1.12 This takes the best versions of engine models available and uses them as the in-game models for Realism Overhaul parts

@linuxgurugamer Instead of listing mods under category headings, consider a Y/N column for each category to allow for nuances of mods that fit into multiple categories. I recognize that you have 1000s of "easy" KSP modding tasks so I took the liberty of doing the reformat. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ln4mk1EoDAdLEyPRXQXx7Vi4wGcFcS9u4wcgBtipvSs/edit?usp=sharing

Go ahead and re-copy my copy if it helps, or if you want me to make a 1st pass at mods that actually belong in more categories I'll do that. And, if you hate the idea, I'm not insulted

50 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

I don't see the green filter icons, this is what I am seeing:

I think I see what's going on. Google Sheets seems to prefer sharing filter results instead of the filter conditions across users. Try this:

  1. Click any column name in row 10 (it doesn't matter which one, Sheets seems smart enough to extend your selection later to include everything)
  2. Data / Filter Views / Create New Temporary Filter View from the top menu (alternate: click the filter icon instead of the menu)
  3. The green filter icons should show up. Click to filter/sort by a column.

I think filtering might be smoother if you have edit permissions to my copy. That should enable some grayed-out filtering options. Granted.

4 hours ago, DeadJohn said:

I think I see what's going on. Google Sheets seems to prefer sharing filter results instead of the filter conditions across users. Try this:

  1. Click any column name in row 10 (it doesn't matter which one, Sheets seems smart enough to extend your selection later to include everything)
  2. Data / Filter Views / Create New Temporary Filter View from the top menu (alternate: click the filter icon instead of the menu)
  3. The green filter icons should show up. Click to filter/sort by a column.

I think filtering might be smoother if you have edit permissions to my copy. That should enable some grayed-out filtering options. Granted.

The filters are acting inconsistently depending on whether someone owns the sheet, has write access, or has read access. As an alternative I tried 6 new slicer buttons at the top of the page. The slicers seem better than filters when I'm logged out of Google with read-only access.

(Aaargggh ... the slicers work well across accounts and browsers, but are non-functional from the Android Sheets app. Other forums say it's been broken since 2019.)

To make better use of screen real estate I also moved some of the static description rows to a new "Notes" sheet. The main sheet now just has a single header row followed by data.

Please let me know how the slicers work from whatever browser/app you use.

Sorry, they are just too confusing.

I think I'm going to adopt your idea of the secondary type columns, but will be sticking with the static spreadsheet, at least for now.

To a certain extent, this may even be better suited to a web page, with a small MySql db in the back end, to allow standardized queries.  But that may be for a future date, for now, I have additions I have to add, and will also go through the current listings and add the secondary entries, if appropriate

Thanks
I just started adding tanks as a category, since there are a lot of mods which are mostly tanks.  It's also now a secondary category on the spreadsheet, will be filled out over time
